channel.title: Website on HEROBOTS
channel.description: Recent content in Website on HEROBOTS

item.title: READY
item.description: This is the first post of the website, and to announce the launch of the website! When the HERO 1 first starts up, it makes a “READY” proclamation. So, instead of the typical “Hello World” or “Blinking LED”, we’re going to start with “READY.” For those not familiar, here’s a video of a HERO 1 starting up. Enjoy, and stay tuned!
